title: Donate skins to us poor
body: some of us can't afford skins

replies.body: some of use have chosen to have skins yes, but these people go days without food
Ayy lmao now i'm homeless with only a laptop and bad internet connection outside McDonald's
Not sure if troll or serious
yes we do and it was wurf
XD Now cough up the dough

Like Riots facebook to get a free Riot Girl Tristana skin.
Follow Riots twitter to get a free Dreadknight Garen skin.
Contact support to get a free Unchained Alistar skin (usually requires subscribing to youtube but that doesn't work for OCE).
Sometimes people will give away free skin codes on the boards (and forums prior) so keep an eye out for that.
It's not uncommon for streamers/youtubers to do give-aways involving RP/skins.

Other than that, you're on your own.
